name: RealFaviconGenerator
tagline: Generate favicon for all major platforms
body:
### Favicon Generator

RealFaviconGenerator is, well, a [Favicon Generator](http://realfavicongenerator.net/). Not a classic one, but a generator for all platforms: PC, iOS, Android, Windows 8...

### Favicon Checker

RealFaviconGenerator comes with a [Favicon Checker](http://realfavicongenerator.net/favicon_checker). Use it to monitor the health of your favicon. Does it look good on Android? Find out!

### Report an issue

Find a bug? Please [report it](https://github.com/phbernard/realfavicongenerator/issues).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
